question: What are your store hours?
answer: We are open Monday through Friday 9 AM to 9 PM, Saturday 9 AM to 10 PM, and Sunday 10 AM to 8 PM.

question: Do you offer price matching?
answer: Yes, we offer price matching on identical items from major competitors. Please bring the competitor's current advertisement.

question: Is there parking available?
answer: We have a parking lot with 50 spaces. During peak hours, street parking is also available on the adjacent streets.

question: Do you repair electronics in-store?
answer: Yes, we have a dedicated repair center for laptops, phones, and tablets. Repairs usually take 2-5 days depending on parts availability.

question: Are there any upcoming sales?
answer: We have our annual Spring Tech Sale starting next weekend. Sign up for our newsletter to get early access and additional discounts.

question: Do you have a return policy?
answer: Yes, we accept returns within 30 days with receipt. Items must be in original condition and packaging.

question: Can I place orders online for pickup?
answer: Absolutely! You can order online and pick up in-store. We'll have your order ready within 2 hours during business hours.

question: Do you deliver patio furniture?
answer: Yes, we offer delivery services for patio furniture within a 25-mile radius. Delivery is free for purchases over $500.

question: Do you offer assembly services for furniture?
answer: Yes, we offer professional assembly services for a fee starting at $49.99. The exact cost depends on the complexity of the furniture.

question: Is there a warranty on garden equipment?
answer: All our garden equipment comes with a minimum 1-year manufacturer warranty. We also offer extended warranties for up to 3 years.

question: Do you offer delivery services?
answer: We offer same-day delivery within a 10-mile radius for orders over $50. Delivery fee is $9.99.

question: Are you hiring?
answer: Yes, we are currently looking for part-time sales associates. Please apply online or visit the store with your resume.

question: Do you offer personal styling services?
answer: Yes, we offer complimentary styling sessions with our fashion experts. Appointments are recommended but walk-ins are welcome based on availability.

question: Can I return items purchased on sale?
answer: Sale items can be returned within 14 days for store credit only. Final clearance items marked as 'Final Sale' cannot be returned.

question: Do you carry plus sizes?
answer: Yes, we carry sizes XS through 3XL in most of our women's clothing lines and up to 2XL in men's clothing.

question: What gaming consoles do you have in stock?
answer: We currently have PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Nintendo Switch, and Steam Deck in stock. Limited quantities are available for the PS5 and Xbox Series X.

question: Do you have student discounts?
answer: Yes, we offer a 10% student discount on most items with a valid student ID. This cannot be combined with other promotions.

question: What's your holiday return policy?
answer: Items purchased between November 1st and December 24th can be returned until January 31st with a receipt.

question: Do you recycle old electronics?
answer: Yes, we have an electronics recycling program. You can bring in old devices, and we'll recycle them responsibly. There's no fee for this service.

question: Do you offer technical support?
answer: Yes, our Geek Squad offers technical support services including device setup, virus removal, and troubleshooting. Fees vary based on the service.

question: Do you sell plants and gardening supplies?
answer: Yes, we have a large garden center with a variety of plants, seeds, soils, fertilizers, and gardening tools. Our inventory varies seasonally.

question: Can I get custom window treatments?
answer: Yes, we offer custom window treatments including blinds, shades, and curtains. Our design consultants can help you choose the perfect options for your home.

question: Do you offer interior design consultations?
answer: Yes, we offer interior design consultations for $75, which is credited toward your purchase if you spend over $500. Appointments can be scheduled online or by phone.

question: What's your rain check policy?
answer: If an advertised item is out of stock, we can issue a rain check valid for 30 days. This guarantees the sale price when the item becomes available.

question: Do you install kitchen appliances?
answer: We offer professional installation services for kitchen appliances starting at $129.99. This includes delivery, installation, and removal of old appliances.

question: Do you alter clothes purchased in-store?
answer: Yes, we offer basic alterations for clothing purchased in our store. Hemming and simple adjustments are free, while more complex alterations have a fee.

question: When will the new seasonal collection arrive?
answer: Our Spring/Summer collection will arrive by the first week of March. VIP members get early access to the collection 3 days before the public launch.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes, our Style Rewards program gives you 1 point for every $1 spent. You get a $10 reward for every 200 points earned, plus exclusive member promotions.

question: Do you sell gift cards?
answer: Yes, we sell physical and digital gift cards in denominations from $25 to $500. Physical gift cards are available in-store, and digital ones can be purchased online.

question: Can I reserve items to try on?
answer: Yes, you can use our app to reserve items to try on in-store. We'll hold them in a fitting room for you for up to 1 hour after your selected time.

question: Do you have organic produce?
answer: Yes, we have a dedicated organic produce section with locally sourced fruits and vegetables when available. We also have organic dairy, meat, and pantry items.

question: What are your deli hours?
answer: Our deli is open daily from 7 AM to 8 PM. Hot food is available from 11 AM to 7 PM.

question: Do you offer catering services?
answer: Yes, we offer catering services for events of all sizes. Orders must be placed at least 48 hours in advance. We have party platters, sandwich trays, and custom options.

question: Can I order a custom cake?
answer: Yes, our bakery takes custom cake orders. Please place your order at least 72 hours in advance. We have a catalog of designs or can create something special.

question: Do you sell beer and wine?
answer: Yes, we have a large selection of craft beers, domestic beers, and wines. We also have a nice selection of local breweries and wineries.

question: Do you have a pharmacy in-store?
answer: Yes, our pharmacy is open Monday through Friday 8 AM to 9 PM, Saturday 9 AM to 7 PM, and Sunday 10 AM to 6 PM. We also offer prescription delivery.

question: Do you offer grocery delivery?
answer: Yes, we offer same-day grocery delivery through our app or website. Orders placed before 1 PM can be delivered by 6 PM. Delivery fee is $7.99 or free for orders over $100.

question: Do you have gluten-free options?
answer: Yes, we have a dedicated gluten-free section with breads, pastas, snacks, and baking supplies. Many of our prepared foods also have gluten-free options clearly labeled.

question: Do you have a salad bar?
answer: Yes, our salad bar is open daily from 10 AM to 8 PM. It's priced by weight at $8.99 per pound and includes a variety of fresh ingredients and house-made dressings.

question: Do you accept SNAP/EBT benefits?
answer: Yes, we accept SNAP/EBT benefits for eligible food items. We also participate in the Double Up Food Bucks program for fresh fruits and vegetables.

question: Do you rent camping equipment?
answer: Yes, we rent tents, sleeping bags, backpacks, and other camping gear. Weekend rentals run Friday to Monday. A security deposit is required.

question: Do you have a climbing wall?
answer: Yes, we have a 30-foot climbing wall with routes for beginners to advanced climbers. Day passes are $15, or free with any purchase over $75.

question: Do you sell fishing licenses?
answer: Yes, we sell fishing licenses for the state. You'll need a valid ID and can purchase daily, weekly, or annual licenses at our customer service desk.

question: Do you repair bikes?
answer: Yes, our bike shop offers repairs, tune-ups, and custom builds. Basic tune-ups start at $65, and most repairs can be completed within 1-3 days.

question: Do you offer guided hiking tours?
answer: Yes, we organize weekend hiking tours for various skill levels. Sign-up is required at least 3 days in advance. The cost is $25 per person, which includes a trail map and snack.

question: Do you have a shoe fitting service?
answer: Yes, we offer professional shoe fitting services using our 3D foot scanning technology. This service is complimentary and helps you find the perfect athletic shoes for your feet.

question: Do you have a running club?
answer: Yes, our store hosts a free running club that meets every Tuesday and Thursday at 6 PM and Saturday at 8 AM. All levels are welcome.

question: Do you restring tennis rackets?
answer: Yes, we offer tennis racket restringing services. Prices range from $20-$40 depending on the string type. Most restringing is completed within 48 hours.

question: Can I try out equipment before buying?
answer: Yes, we have a dedicated testing area for trying out tennis rackets, baseball bats, and golf clubs. For larger equipment like kayaks, we have demo days once a month.

question: Do you sell team uniforms?
answer: Yes, we offer team uniforms for various sports with custom printing and embroidery services. We offer volume discounts for teams of 10 or more players.

question: Do you host book signings?
answer: Yes, we regularly host author events and book signings. Check our events calendar on our website or sign up for our newsletter to stay informed about upcoming events.

question: Do you buy used books?
answer: Yes, we buy gently used books for store credit. We offer 30% of our selling price in store credit. Please bring books during our buying hours: Tuesday-Saturday, 10 AM to 4 PM.

question: Do you have a children's story time?
answer: Yes, we host children's story time every Saturday at 10:30 AM for ages 3-7. It's free and no registration is required.

question: Can you order books that aren't in stock?
answer: Yes, we can special order almost any book in print. Most orders arrive within 3-5 business days, and there's no obligation to purchase upon arrival.

question: Do you have a book club?
answer: Yes, we have multiple book clubs that meet monthly. Each focuses on different genres. There's no fee to join, but we do ask that you purchase the book from our store.

question: Do you sell vinyl records?
answer: Yes, we have a large selection of vinyl records including new releases, reissues, and used classics. We get new inventory weekly, typically on Tuesdays.

question: Do you buy used CDs and DVDs?
answer: Yes, we buy used CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays, and vinyl in good condition. We offer cash or store credit, with store credit giving you 25% more value.

question: Do you have listening stations?
answer: Yes, we have listening stations throughout the store where you can preview albums before purchasing. Just ask a staff member for assistance.

question: Do you host live music?
answer: Yes, we host local musicians for in-store performances most Friday evenings from 7-9 PM. These events are free and open to all ages.

question: Do you sell turntables and audio equipment?
answer: Yes, we carry a selection of turntables, speakers, headphones, and accessories ranging from entry-level to audiophile quality.

question: Do you offer facials and skincare treatments?
answer: Yes, we offer a range of facials and skincare treatments. Our signature facial is 60 minutes and costs $85. We also have express 30-minute options and specialized treatments.

question: Do you have a loyalty program for product purchases?
answer: Yes, for every $150 spent on products, you'll receive a $15 reward toward your next purchase. You also get a free birthday gift and exclusive member-only promotions.

question: Are your products cruelty-free?
answer: Yes, all our skincare and makeup products are cruelty-free. We also have a large selection of vegan options clearly marked with our vegan symbol.

question: Do you offer makeup application services?
answer: Yes, we offer makeup application services starting at $45 for a basic application. Bridal makeup and special occasion packages are also available.

question: Do you have samples of your products?
answer: Yes, we offer samples of most skincare products upon request. With purchases over $50, you can select three deluxe samples from our sample bar.

question: Do you offer massage therapy?
answer: Yes, we offer various massage therapies including Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, and prenatal. Sessions range from 30 to 90 minutes, starting at $60 for a 30-minute session.

question: Do you sell essential oils?
answer: Yes, we carry a comprehensive range of pure essential oils, blends, and diffusers. Our staff can help you select oils for specific wellness goals.

question: Do you have a sauna or steam room?
answer: Yes, we have both infrared saunas and a eucalyptus steam room. They can be booked as standalone 30-minute sessions for $25 or added to any service for $15.

question: Do you offer gift certificates?
answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates in any amount starting at $25. They can be purchased in-store or online and are valid for all services and products for one year.

question: What is your cancellation policy?
answer: We require 24-hour notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations or no-shows will be charged 50% of the service price.

question: Do you host birthday parties?
answer: Yes, we offer birthday party packages for children ages 4-12. Packages start at $199 for up to 8 children and include activities, a dedicated host, and a special gift for the birthday child.

question: Do you have a play area?
answer: Yes, we have a supervised play area for children ages 3-10. Parents must remain in the store, and there's a 1-hour time limit during busy periods.

question: Do you carry educational toys?
answer: Yes, we have a large selection of educational toys organized by age group and developmental skills. Our staff can help recommend toys based on your child's interests and learning goals.

question: Do you offer a baby registry?
answer: Yes, we offer a baby registry service both in-store and online. Registrants receive a 10% completion discount on remaining items after the event date.

question: Do you sell battery-free toys?
answer: Yes, we have a dedicated section for battery-free, eco-friendly toys including wooden toys, puzzles, and creative play items made from sustainable materials.
